thing-type.label: Irrigation Zone
thing-type.description: Represents an irrigation zone as defined in Cloudrain

channel-group-type.label: Irrigation Properties
channel-group-type.description: Properties of an irrigation in a zone

channel-group-type.label: Irrigation Commands
channel-group-type.description: Commands to control an irrigation in a zone

channel.label: Irrigation Duration
channel.description: The duration in seconds to be used for the next command.

channel.label: Start irrigation
channel.description: Start an irrigation with the defined duration. Behaves like changing the irrigation if one is active exists in the zone.

channel.label: Change irrigation
channel.description: Change an active irrigation to the defined duration. The active irrigation will start over with the new duration. Has no effect if no irrigation is active in the zone.

channel.label: Stop irrigation,
channel.description: Stop the current irrigation and continue with the schedule. Has no effect if no irrigation is active in the zone.

channel-type.label: Command
channel-type.description: A command for an irrigation zone

channel-type.label: Command Duration
channel-type.description: A duration in seconds for an irrigation command
